snippet: Voters head to the polls Tuesday in Indiana, North Carolina, West Virginia and Wisconsin, and while two marquee races have grabbed the spotlight, several down-ticket contests may shape the House next year.
abstract: Voters head to the polls Tuesday in Indiana, North Carolina, West Virginia and Wisconsin, and while two marquee races have grabbed the spotlight, several down-ticket contests may shape the House next year.

headline.main: Primary Preview: Recall, Redistricting and Confident Republicans
